verses.verse: The mighty<WH410> God<WH430>, even the Lord<WH3068>, has spoken<WH1696>, and called<WH7121> the earth<WH776> from the rising<WH4217> of the sun<WH8121> unto the going down there<WH3996>.
Out of Zion<WH6726>, the perfection<WH4359> of beauty<WH3308>, God<WH430> has shined<WH3313>.
Our God<WH430> shall come<WH935>, and shall not keep silence<WH2790>: a fire<WH784> shall devour<WH398> before<WH6440> him<WH3966>, and it shall be very stormy<WH8175> round about him<WH5439>.
He shall call<WH7121> to the heavens<WH8064> from above<WH5920>, and to the earth<WH776>, that he may judge<WH1777> his people<WH5971>.
Gather<WH622> my saints<WH2623> together unto me<WH3772>; those that have made a covenant<WH1285> with me by sacrifice<WH2077>.
And the heavens<WH8064> shall declare<WH5046> his righteousness<WH6664>: for God<WH430> is judge<WH8199> himself<WH5542>. Selah.
Hear<WH8085>, O my people<WH5971>, and I will speak<WH1696>; O Israel<WH3478>, and I will testify<WH5749> against you<WH430>: I am God, even your God<WH430>.
I will not rebuke<WH3198> you for your sacrifices<WH2077> or your burnt offerings<WH5930>, that have been continually before me<WH8548>.
I will take<WH3947> no bullock<WH6499> out of your house<WH1004>, nor he goats<WH6260> out of your folds<WH4356>.
For every animal<WH2416> of the forest<WH3293> is mine<WH929>, and the cattle upon a thousand<WH505> hills<WH2042>.
I know<WH3045> all the birds<WH5775> of the mountains<WH2022>: and the wild animals<WH2123> of the field<WH7704> are mine<WH5978>.
If I were hungry<WH7456>, I would not tell<WH559> you<WH8398>: for the world is mine<WH4393>, and the fullness there.
Will I eat<WH398> the flesh<WH1320> of bulls<WH47>, or drink<WH8354> the blood<WH1818> of goats<WH6260>?
Offer<WH2076> unto God<WH430> thanksgiving<WH8426>; and pay<WH7999> your vows<WH5088> unto the most High<WH5945>:
And call<WH7121> upon me in the day<WH3117> of trouble<WH6869>: I will deliver<WH2502> you<WH3513>, and you shall glorify me.
But unto the wicked<WH7563> God<WH430> says<WH559>, What have you to do to declare<WH5608> my statutes<WH2706>, or that you should take<WH5375> my covenant<WH1285> in your mouth<WH6310>?
Seeing you hate<WH8130> instruction<WH4148>, and cast<WH7993> my words<WH1697> behind you<WH310>.
When you saw<WH7200> a thief<WH1590>, then you consented<WH7521> with him<WH2506>, and have been partaker with adulterers<WH5003>.
You give<WH7971> your mouth<WH6310> to evil<WH7451>, and your tongue<WH3956> frames<WH6775> deceit<WH4820>.
You sit<WH3427> and speak<WH1696> against your brother<WH251>; you<WH5414> slander<WH1848> your own mother<WH517>'s son<WH1121>.

These things have you done<WH6213>, and I kept silence<WH2790>; you thought<WH1819> that I was altogether<WH1961> such a one as yourself<WH3198>: but I will rebuke you<WH6186>, and set them in order before your eyes<WH5869>.
Now consider<WH995> this<WH7911>, you that forget God<WH433>, lest I tear you in pieces<WH2963>, and there be none to deliver<WH5337>.
Whoever offers<WH2076> praise<WH8426> glorifies<WH3513> me<WH7760>: and to him that orders his behavior<WH1870> rightly will I show<WH7200> the salvation<WH3468> of God<WH430>.
